Package hardware

Class HVAC

  • java.lang.Object
    • hardware.HVAC

  • public class HVAC
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    University of Mannheim This class represents a HVAC system in the simulation framework.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double currentPC
      Current power consumption of the HVAC system.
      private double currentTemperature
      Current building temperature.
      private double currentTemperatureSetpoint
      Current building temperature setpoint of the HVAC system.
      private double currentUtil
      Current utilization of the HVAC system.
      private double minTemp
      Minimal building temperature that can be reached.
      private double temperatureChangePerTimeInterval
      Fixed delta temperature that indicates the change of the building temperature per timestep, when the current temperature setpoint does not match the current building temperature.

      • deepCopy

        public HVAC deepCopy​()
        Provides a deep copy of this HVAC system instance.
        Returns:
        Deep copy of the HVAC instance on which the method is called.

      • update

        public void update​(double overallServerUtil,
                   int itPowerConsumption,
                   double pue)
        Updates the current buliding temperature, the current utilization of the HVAC system, and the current power consumption of the HVAC system. Uses the PowerModelSelector class to retrieve the current HVAC power consumption.
        Parameters:
        overallServerUtil - Current utilization of all servers in the DC to which this HVAC system belongs.
        itPowerConsumption - Current IT power consumption of the DC to which this HVAC system belongs.
        pue - Current PUE of the DC to which this HVAC system belongs.
